revised_title: Canonical Solutions of Axisymmetric Gravitation with Time Dependence
tldr: The authors present a canonical solution for axisymmetric gravitation including time dependence, using the Cauchy-Kowalewski theorem. They find that the general solution is constructed from an arbitrary function and can be expressed in a canonical form with only three functions. This work contributes to the understanding of gravitational fields and their behavior in space-time.
